AdminNotification.PluginDescription: Places a message on all user's dashboards.
AdminNotification.EnabledSettingDescription: If enabled, the provided message will be displayed to users upon login. (Logoff/Logon required in v3.x)
AdminNotification.ContextSettingDescription: Sets what type of message should be displayed (affects color).
AdminNotification.TitleSettingDescription: Sets the title of the message. This will be dislayed in bold with the message.
